i18n.key: document title strictly for internal use, used for displaying the document in the Backoffice.
short title for navigation elements (menus, breadcrumb, etc. - 80 characters max.)

Full title displayed in your browser's title bar (corresponds to the TITLE tag used for referencing). Recommended size: 60 to 80 characters. Put the most important keywords first. This title will be completed by the website name if the option ″Append website's name to the title of the pages″ is enabled on the website.
If the original template has been modified, update it by pressing the opposite button.
Do you really want to update this page template? A bad template can corrupt the existing content…
drop a skin here to apply it to the element
description of the page for the search engines. Recommended size: between 160 and 180 characters. Place the most important keywords first.
The start publication date indicates the first date on which visitors will be able to view the page. Before this date, it will be impossible to view the page.
The end publication date indicates the latest date on which visitors will be able to view the page. After this date, it will be impossible to view the page.
Comma-separated keywords related to the page. Limit to keywords that most match the page contents.
It will only be possible to access the page with a URL starting with ″https://″. With this option, the server must be configured to accept HTTPS connections
Index for the sub-topics, only when the page is functionally tagged
